questionText:
Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny was released in 
 a) 2015 
 b) 1997 
 c) 2023

Interstellar is: 
 a) Adventure movie 
 b) Thriller movie 
 c) Sci-Fi movie

The Butterfly Effect: 
 a) is a movie about animals 
 b) Time travel movie 
 c) Sci-Fi movie

The Matrix was released in: 
 a) 1999 
 b) 2003 
 c) 1995

Titanic is a: 
 a) Documentary 
 b) Romantic movie 
 c) Thriller

Avatar was directed by: 
 a) James Cameron 
 b) Steven Spielberg 
 c) Christopher Nolan

Inception is a: 
 a) Comedy 
 b) Action movie 
 c) Sci-Fi movie

Which movie is based on a Marvel comic? 
 a) Iron Man 
 b) Inception 
 c) Titanic

Harry Potter series is about: 
 a) Time travel 
 b) Wizards 
 c) Superheroes

Jurassic Park features: 
 a) Robots 
 b) Dinosaurs 
 c) Space travel

The main character in The Dark Knight is: 
 a) Superman 
 b) Batman 
 c) Iron Man

The Lion King is a: 
 a) Animated movie 
 b) Horror movie 
 c) Action movie

Which movie features a character named Neo? 
 a) The Matrix 
 b) Avatar 
 c) The Dark Knight

Star Wars series primarily focuses on: 
 a) Space exploration 
 b) Wars in space 
 c) Medieval battles

The Godfather is a: 
 a) Sci-Fi movie 
 b) Crime drama 
 c) Documentary

The main character in Forrest Gump is known for: 
 a) Playing basketball 
 b) Running 
 c) Painting

Which movie involves dreams within dreams? 
 a) Inception 
 b) Avatar 
 c) Interstellar

The Avengers is about: 
 a) Space exploration 
 b) A group of superheroes 
 c) Dinosaurs

Who directed Pulp Fiction? 
 a) Quentin Tarantino 
 b) Steven Spielberg 
 c) Martin Scorsese

Frozen is about: 
 a) A snowman 
 b) A magical queen 
 c) Both a and b

The main character in Gladiator is: 
 a) A gladiator 
 b) A king 
 c) A general

Which movie features an AI named HAL 9000? 
 a) 2001: A Space Odyssey 
 b) The Terminator 
 c) I, Robot

Schindler's List is a: 
 a) War movie 
 b) Comedy 
 c) Thriller

The Hobbit series is based on a book by: 
 a) J.K. Rowling 
 b) J.R.R. Tolkien 
 c) George R.R. Martin

In The Shawshank Redemption, the protagonist escapes using: 
 a) A tunnel 
 b) A helicopter 
 c) A car

The Wizard of Oz features: 
 a) A magical road 
 b) A wizard 
 c) A magical storm

The Avengers fight against: 
 a) Aliens 
 b) Robots 
 c) Dinosaurs

In The Lord of the Rings, Frodo's mission is to: 
 a) Destroy a ring 
 b) Find a sword 
 c) Save his homeland

Which movie stars both Brad Pitt and Leonardo DiCaprio? 
 a) Once Upon a Time in Hollywood 
 b) Fight Club 
 c) The Departed

The movie Gravity is about: 
 a) Space exploration 
 b) Surviving in space 
 c) Building a spaceship

The movie Joker explores: 
 a) The origin story of Joker 
 b) The fall of Batman 
 c) Gotham City's dark side

The Titanic sinks because of: 
 a) A storm 
 b) An iceberg 
 c) A fire

Who is the main character in Toy Story? 
 a) Woody 
 b) Buzz Lightyear 
 c) Andy

Which movie was directed by Alfred Hitchcock? 
 a) Psycho 
 b) Vertigo 
 c) The Shining
